More than 12,000 Ukrainian military has been trained in Germany since the beginning of the Russian large -scale invasion of Ukraine.

About thisIt is saidon the page of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of Ukraine on Twitter.

“Already more than 12,000 soldiers have undergone military training in the German Defense Ministry as part of the EUMAM UA training mission. Among them are defenders who work on the Gepard anti -aircraft tanks, ”the post stated.

More than 12,000 🇺🇦 soldiers have already received military training from the@Bmvg_bundeswehras part of the EUMAM UA training mission.

Among them are defenders working on 🇩🇪 Gepard anti-aircraft tanks.

Thank you for the vital support in the difficult times 🫂

📹@GermanyDiplopic.twitter.com/P4EV8riIED

— MFA of Ukraine 🇺🇦 (@MFA_Ukraine)March 12, 2024

In the foreign policy department of Ukraine thanked for support.

As reported by the Armyinform, the German GovernmentreportedAbout the departure of the next military assistance party to Ukraine, which contains, among other things, 14,000 artillery shells of the caliber 155 mm.
